msbt.message: Thank you SO MUCH for the b-day card! It was cool that you got me a prezzie! I wanted to send you a little something too! So I did!
OHMIGOSH! I checked my mail this morning and saw you'd sent me a b-day card AND a prezzie?! I want to say thank you, so I attached a little prezzie for you too. I hope you like it!
Your birthday prezzie got here safe and sound! That was, like, the best surprise EVER! Thanks so much. I got you a little something too.
I got your b-day card! Thank you SO MUCH for that really heartfelt message. I totes cried when I read it. So, so, so, so, sooooo good. Let's def be friends 4-FOREVER!
I was so excited to get your b-day note! It made me feel so warm and fuzzy, it's like the letter had happy magic cast on it! Is that a thing? Happy magic? , are you a happiness wizard?
I JUST got the birthday card you sent me and WOW! Your note was so...so INTENSE! It got me supes fired up! I'm so full of energy, I'm running around in circles while I write this!
